tool_description: Check if the eMail belongs to a  known dalaleak. This API gives you fully detailed informations on the found sources.
name: eMail Data Leak Checker
title: eMail Data Leak Checker

api_list.name: eMail Data Leak Check
api_list.description: Pass email address and wait for the API response. It gives you a simple "Ture" or "False" depending if the email has been found in dataleak or not

api_list.name: eMail Data Leak Details
api_list.description: Pass email address and wait for the API response. It gives you detailed information on data leaks on that email address
